wiki.content: According to the Say Hey (I Love You) Songfacts, after 15 years of pioneering social humanitarianism through his blend of hip hop funk, jazz, reggae and rock, on this song Michael Franti wanted to do something different. He told Billboard: "I've made political music my whole life. But at the end of this project, I thought we needed a fun, singalong song given the serious things happening in the world. And while I can't wipe the smile off my face about the song's success, it's just another reminder for me to just make music for the love of it." User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

He told Billboard: "I've made political music my whole life. But at the end of this project, I thought we needed a fun, singalong song given the serious things happening in the world.

track.name: Say Hey (I Love You)
comments: Love to wiggle around to this! Great song!! =)
fun song, surprised me when I first heard it
This song always makes me smile and dance
this song cheers me up & makes me wanna dance around!!!!
I can't keep my butt in a seat when this comes on. Have to dance around! [2]
dance dance joy joy fun fun!!!!
